definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to storm off in a huff (idiom)
long sleeves help one dance beautifully (idiom); money and power will help you in any occupation
armband (e.g. as part of uniform or to show status)
lit. both sleeves flowing in the breeze (idiom); having clean hands/uncorrupted/unsoiled by corrupt practices

lit. cut sleeve (idiom); fig. euphemism for homosexuality, originating from History of Western Han 漢書|汉书: emperor Han Aidi (real name Liu Xin) was in bed with his lover Dong Xian, and had to attend a court audience that morning. Not wishing to awaken Dong Xian, who was sleeping with his head resting on the emperor's long robe sleeve, Aidi used a knife to cut off the lower half of his sleeve.

sentences.english: Had the shoulder hubble-bubble sleeve feel relaxed fashion.
sentences.chinese: 肩部的泡泡袖感觉轻松时尚。

sentences.english: Cut the interfacings and underlining and tack them to the wrong side of the sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 裁衬布和衬里并粗缝到袖了的反面。

sentences.english: She bought a nice dolman sleeved shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她买了一件蝙蝠袖的外套，很漂亮。

sentences.english: First, according to the age of the child to choose the child-specific cuff.
sentences.chinese: 第一，根据儿童年龄选择儿童专用的袖带。

sentences.english: Which kind of sleeves of windbreaker do you like the most?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢风褛哪一种款式的袖？

sentences.english: Raphael's name on the armband, Strinati says, is a tribute to Chigi.
sentences.chinese: 斯提纳地说，袖带上拉斐尔的名字是向齐格表示敬意。

sentences.english: You hold my hand and walk, I hold your sleeve do not look back.
sentences.chinese: 你握著我的手一路走，我牵著你的袖不回头。

sentences.english: A short blouse with sleeves worn under a jumper or pinafore dress.
sentences.chinese: 穿在工作服或围裙下的有袖短上衣。

sentences.english: Puffed sleeves with ruching details at seams.
sentences.chinese: 膨化袖褶饰在接缝处的细节。

sentences.english: Hubble-bubble sleeve design, increase modelling feeling.
sentences.chinese: 泡泡袖计划，增添制型感。

sentences.english: The sleeve dance is an Oriental creation.
sentences.chinese: “袖”舞是东方舞蹈的一大创造。

sentences.english: "The sleeve"the dance is a big creation which the East dances.
sentences.chinese: “袖”舞是东方舞蹈的一大创造。

sentences.english: Now, squeeze the bulb to inflate the cuff until the pulse can no longer be felt.
sentences.chinese: 现在，挤压橡胶球以对袖带充气直到摸不到脉搏。

sentences.english: "The sleeve"already became the Chinese classical dance one unique language.
sentences.chinese: “袖”已经成为中国古典舞的一种独特语言。

sentences.english: Unless you've an ace up your sleeve, we are dished.
sentences.chinese: 除非你袖中藏有王牌，否则我们是输定了。

definition: garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
lapel/overlap of Chinese gown/fig. bosom (the seat of emotions)/to cherish (ambition, desires, honorable intentions etc) in one's bosom
